DOC.brief_summary: A Confirmation of Safety, Tolerance and Efficacy of PICOPREP in Clinical Practice.
DOC.brief_title: Monitoring of Safety and Tolerance of PICOPREP in Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible for treatment with PICOPREP® for bowel cleansing prior to endoscopic examination or surgery Patients in which prescription of PICOPREP® is contraindicated
